string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: See all your apps.\n Touch the Launcher icon. @drawable/all_apps
Rules\n The only rule of CyanogenMod: You dont ask for ETAs.
Nightly Builds (Advanced)\n Available on ROM Manager. Do not submit issues on Google Code for these. @drawable/rommanager
Drag apps to your Home screen.\n Touch & hold an app in the Launcher until it vibrates.
Do not listen to Dr Kmobs\n He is not a real doctor, and that is not a thermometer. @drawable/stethoscope
Rearrange your Home screen.\n Touch & hold an item and when it vibrates, drag it where you want.
Ballmer Peak\n Optimal coding ability takes place between a BAC of .129 and .138.
Remove items.\n Touch & hold an item and when it vibrates, drag it to the Trash icon. @drawable/trash
iPhone\n You\'re holding it wrong. Always.
Multiple Home screens.\n Swipe left or right to switch. Drag items to other screens.
Number 1 Priority\n Don\'t forget to keep your winzip up to date.
Kang [kayng] - (verb)\n Upgraded my winzip br0. Thanks to my patient lady putting up with my devvin. @drawable/kang_truck
Definition of Open\n repo init -u git://android.git.kernel.org/platform/manifest.git ; repo sync ; make. @drawable/android_open
Catroast\n Always catproof your electronics, cats are bound to pee on them. @drawable/cat_attack
Done with this widget?\n Touch & hold it and when it vibrates, drag it to the Trash icon.

string-array.name: tips2
string-array.item: Home is a garden \nTouch & hold an empty spot \nTo grow new icons
Phone isn’t waterproof \nDo not immerse in water \nor other fluids
Want some more home screens? \nSwipe left and right to find them \n(No theft required)
Little Home screen dots \nWhat could they possibly do? \nTouch & hold to learn.
Status bar icons \nTo discover their secrets \nPull the windowshade
There is a trick to \nDragging items twixt Home screens \nPause at the edges
Touch Market for apps \nLike a box of chocolates \nEach one a surprise
Oh, and by the way: \nCeci n’est pas une trombone \nI am an Android
